title: Prescribing Antidepressants During Breastfeeding
itunes:title: Prescribing Antidepressants During Breastfeeding
description:
Can we use antidepressants during breastfeeding? This episode discusses the use of antidepressants during breastfeeding, including SSRIs, TCAs, bupropion, and mirtazapine.

Faculty: Lauren Osborne, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Lorena Rodríguez M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 1 CME: Understanding the Use of Psychotropic Drugs in Lactation
  • Antidepressants During Breastfeeding
